page.title: 19HOME LIFE
page.content:
A NORMAL SCHOOL DAY FOR ME IS TO GET UP AT 06.30,GET DRESSED,GO OUTSIDE, TACK OUR HORSES UP,THEN RIDE DOWN THE VILLAGE TO A FIELD WHERE THEY GRAZE. THEN BACK HOME FOR BREAKFAST,SCHOOL BY 09.00,ASSEMBLY & MATHS TILL BREAK. ENGLISH TILL DINNER TIME.WE WATCH 3 OR 4 TV PROGRAMMES A WEEK.AFTERNOON, HISTORY,GEOGRAPHY,SWIMMING,FOOTBALL, ART & CRAFT.HOME TIME 15.30.MOST CHILDREN LIVE ONE OR TW0 MILES FROM SCHOOL,I LIVE 8 MILES AWAY.I FETCH MY HORSES BACK,MUCK THEM OUT THEN TEA. TELEVISION TILL 21.00(A TEAM,KNIGHT RIDER)I GO TO BED & READ TILL 21.45. {TIMOTHY MAYNARD WINSTON LLOYD CARTTER
{D.O.B 15 11 1973 { LONG LANE C OF E PRIMARY SCHOOL.
HOME LIFE EDUCATION LEISURE.
